extendedInfo.description: â¢ Capture and upload your videosâ¢ New Interface, faster, cleaner and full of Ice Cream Sandwich/Jelly Bean goodness !â¢ Add your favorite Users and Playlists to the App Homescreen for quick access.â¢ With the Newsfeed, see all the new videos from your favorite Users and Playlists.â¢ Instant and beautiful Notifications when a new video is published from your favorite Users and Playlists.â¢ Super fast video player !â¢ Watch all the popular videos from your favorite Dailymotion channels (News, Cinema, Music, Sports, Comedy, Sexy and more !).â¢ Share your favorite videos on Facebook and Twitter in one touch.â¢ Offline mode : Sync and watch the videos of your choice without any Internet Connection !â¢ All the above features are available to Android 2.2 and above users !And stay tuned, there is a lot more to come :â¢ Amazing Widgets for your Homescreen.â¢ Jaw-dropping Tablet version with large previews and support for HD1080p videos.â¢ DLNA & uPnP support (to send videos directly to your compatible TV).â¢ Light theme !For all the amazing feedbacks we have received, thank you, and we will try to keep up the good work !The Dailymotion Mobile Teamandroid-feedback@dailymotion.com

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: A nice app but would like to give 5 stars if video zoom out button in the full screen mode works properly.  Indeed when we play the video in full screen mode there is no button that appear to go back to normal mode. Fix it please.
reviews.author: Syed Omer Hussain Shah

reviews.title: Excellent n I enjoy lot
reviews.comment: Mostly I use tl daily motion app to watch my daily shows ..its easy n great quality find here. .. far better than you tube. ... week done guys
reviews.author: sameer raj

reviews.title: Sometimes becomes unresponsive
reviews.comment: Video stops playing and the whole device becomes unresponsive. Audio is still playing in background. Starts playing normally after some time around 10 seconds

reviews.title: Silly

reviews.comment: Interface is OK , but it would be better if you can manually delete words in search and contain history for retrieving

reviews.title: Wifi or 4g wont sync
reviews.comment: Looong lag time to buffer & stream too. Uninstalled useless App and using website like usual. wouldn\'t even show my playlists unless i was adding to one.

reviews.title: Lacks Save Button.
reviews.comment: Best alternative to YouTube. You can watch almost everything if it uploaded on net. One drawback , one can\'t save the videos still there is feature of sync but that not working with network internet connection.  So give a save or download button instead of sync. Then I\'ll give 5 stars.

reviews.title: The best application, but.....
reviews.comment: This is the best application but it shows error as soon as I launch the app. It shows that i have no internet connection even i am connected to an active internet connection. And as soon as I search a video on it, the error disapperas. Please solve this issue so that I may rate Dailymotion 5*
